properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Prabhuvaa ujeevamu nimmu Virigina manassutho ne vededanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kolpoitini modati premanu challaaripoye nee prema naalo Naalo nilupumu needu prema{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Padinavari yaashrayamaa viduva badina vari sahayundaa Gaayapu chetito lepumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aikyataye naa yabhilaasha naadu chedunu tolaginchumu Shatruni shakthini odinchumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
